function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Continued vigilance, early detection, and implementation of containment measures.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Streamlined immigration clearance and effective enforcement of home quarantine.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper segregation, handling, and disposal of infectious and pathological wastes","category":"Waste management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in training and technical personnel, and strict adherence to operational guidelines","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper treatment and disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater before discharge","category":"Waste management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict prohibition of using contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict protocols for collection, disinfection, and disposal of infectious waste under protective conditions.","category":"Waste management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of effective disinfection methods for different types of hospital wastes and regular monitoring of disinfection performance.","category":"Waste management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct extensive research on the inactivation of sars-cov-2 using various disinfection methods","category":"Research & development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement effective disinfection protocols for hospital wastewater, stool, and urine","category":"Waste management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaluate and optimize ozone disinfection methods for sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Research & development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper collection, storage, decay, and disinfection of hospital segregation protocols and provide clear guidelines for waste disposal","category":"Waste management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop comprehensive guidelines for disinfection and disposal of different types of hospital wastes, provide training to waste management personnel","category":"Waste management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comprehensive training and education for facility staff, regular inspection and maintenance of equipment","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Calibration of sterilization equipment, monitoring of temperature, and humidity
